# isExpanded(_:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates whether the item with the specified identifier is in an expanded state.

## Declaration

```swift
func isExpanded(_ item: Any) -> Bool
```

## Discussion

This expansion state persists along with the section snapshot.

## Expanding and collapsing items

- **expandItems(_:)**: Expands the specified items in the section snapshot.
- **collapseItems(_:)**: Collapses the specified items in the section snapshot.

items.description: Expands the specified items in the section snapshot.
items.name: expandItems(_:)

items.description: Collapses the specified items in the section snapshot.
items.name: collapseItems(_:)
